title: Bounce launches Infinity E1 at starting price of Rs 45,099
description: "The Bounce Infinity E1 is designed and engineered to cater to the evolving needs of electric scooter customers in India. We are glad to announce that we are the first and only ones to provide both options – to swap batteries from our network as well as charge-at-home – for the Infinity E1," said Vivekananda Hallekere, Co-founder-CEO Bounce.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
